Texts.Chs: 虽然你可以使用^orange;物质枪^reset;来开采矿石，但是也请你试试^cyan;挖掘器^reset;。尝试在你的^orange;物质汇编机^reset;里制造一个^orange;激光挖掘器^reset;。
Texts.Eng: While a ^orange;Matter Manipulator^reset; does the job, you could also try ^cyan;Mining Guns^reset;. Try building a ^orange;Mining Laser^reset; in your ^orange;Matter Assembler^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 你是不是已经制作出了激光挖掘器？或许你有些遗憾，因为它并不能采集液体。请别担心，快建造^orange;纳米加工器^reset;吧，它可以提高激光挖掘器的^green;开采范围与速度^reset;。
Texts.Eng: You get range and speed with mining guns, but they aren't great for backgrounds and cannot pick up liquids. However, ^green;nothing digs a better hole^reset;. Upgrade it at a ^orange;Nanofabricator^reset;.
